thread.title: Katherine Stacy

author: Katherine Stacy
title: Katherine Stacy
text: I'll start by saying the hair is super soft and very good quality. i got a little shedding when i washed it but its so full it really doesn't make a difference. shipping to cali took about 3 weeks. that was ok. now...if you are a first time lace wig buyer beware of the following. you will need to pluck the hairline because its very thick. bleach the knots and fix the baby hairs. the curl is much tighter than the pic but i actually like the tighter curl. i got a 16 in and it was just past my shoulders. Alot of work to wear it because it looks nothing like the pic. i also added an elastic strap in the back. i been buying synthetic wigs so the style pretty much comes as seen because its easier to manipulate synthetic hair into a specific style. not the same with human hair. i also tinted the lace because the medium brown was still a little too light. next time ill get the darker brown. i really love this wig. but just know you're gonna have to do some work to wear it and it look good.
